OOC: Cardhead is right, the issue with the blitz posting is rough. I have had 
& currently deal with this issue in other RPGs. I left an RPG a month ago 
(non-transformers related) due to getting too many posts a day, (over 50 of them) 
& none of them concerned me. 

But, if a thread is not concerning you, delete. But, we should make sure that 
we don't rush into posting. I posted alot due to Maxima in heavy involvement. 
Believe me, I was thinking about the others involved but also was thinking 
about getting her out of the action quickly as I won't be able to pop on until 
Monday since I will be out of town.  

Each to their own.

Stac

--part1_1e7.a583194.2c100550_boundary
Content-Type: text/html; charset="US-ASCII"
